create_operaton_count_ds_log:
CREATE TABLE IF  NOT EXISTS bi_interface_spap.operation_count(
                                   `id` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
								  `uid` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '用户ID',
								  `start_num1` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num2` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num3` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num4` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num5` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num6` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num7` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num8` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num9` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num10` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num11` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num12` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num13` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num14` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num15` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num16` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num17` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num18` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num19` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num20` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num21` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num22` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num23` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `start_num24` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `create_time` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '当前数据属于哪一天（时间戳：不包含时、分、秒、毫秒）',
								  `os_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT 'osName',
								  `oper_ip` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
								  `channel` INT(6) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '渠道',
 								  `app_version` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '司派版本号',
								  `year` INT ( 9 ) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1900' COMMENT '年',
                                  `month` INT ( 9 ) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '月',
                                  `day` INT ( 9 ) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '日',
                                  `hour` INT ( 9 ) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '小时',
                                  `store_id` INT ( 9 ) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '分区id'
								) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=8421611243179264360 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
select_source_sql:
SELECT
                              `id` ,
							  `uid` ,
							  `start_num1`,
							  `start_num2`,
							  `start_num3`,
							  `start_num4`,
							  `start_num5`,
							  `start_num6`,
							  `start_num7`,
							  `start_num8`,
							  `start_num9`,
							  `start_num10`,
							  `start_num11`,
							  `start_num12`,
							  `start_num13`,
							  `start_num14`,
							  `start_num15`,
							  `start_num16`,
							  `start_num17`,
							  `start_num18`,
							  `start_num19`,
							  `start_num20`,
							  `start_num21`,
							  `start_num22`,
							  `start_num23`,
							  `start_num24`,
							  `create_time`,
							  `os_name`,
							  oper_ip,
							  ifnull(channel,-9) as channel,
							  app_version
                        FROM
                            spap_data_center.operation_counts o
                        LIMIT ${offset} , ${rows}
insert_operaton_count_log:
INSERT INTO bi_interface_spap.operation_count (
	                              `id` ,
								  `uid` ,
								  `start_num1`,
								  `start_num2`,
								  `start_num3`,
								  `start_num4`,
								  `start_num5`,
								  `start_num6`,
								  `start_num7`,
								  `start_num8`,
								  `start_num9`,
								  `start_num10`,
								  `start_num11`,
								  `start_num12`,
								  `start_num13`,
								  `start_num14`,
								  `start_num15`,
								  `start_num16`,
								  `start_num17`,
								  `start_num18`,
								  `start_num19`,
								  `start_num20`,
								  `start_num21`,
								  `start_num22`,
								  `start_num23`,
								  `start_num24`,
								  `create_time`,
								  `os_name`,
								  `oper_ip`	,
								  channel,
							  app_version,
                                `year`,
                                `month`,
                                `day`,
                                `hour`,
                                store_id )
                            VALUES
                                (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
